Headline: #12 Roosevelt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Roosevelt/Blue Island
ShortDescription: WB 12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Blue Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #12 Roosevelt buses are temporarily rerouted via Roosevelt, Morgan, Taylor, Racine, and Roosevelt due to, street blockage near Roosevelt/Blue Island.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 47th. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at 47th.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
